label: Plastic Bags and Bin Liners
description: Products used for waste management and storage, made of plastic materials.

subcategories.label: Bin Liners
subcategories.description: Plastic bags designed to line waste bins and collect household waste.

subcategories.label: Ziplock Bags
subcategories.description: Plastic bags with a ziplock closure, used for storing and transporting items.

subcategories.label: Storage Bags
subcategories.description: Plastic bags used for storing and organizing items in living spaces.

subcategories.label: Drawstring Bags
subcategories.description: Bags with a drawstring closure, used for storing and transporting items.

subcategories.label: Reusable Bags
subcategories.description: Bags made of durable materials, designed for repeated use.
